9bb07003-9126-4c79-862c-1efca7f5dad8.description: Earners of this badge have completed New Hire Orientation. Earners are knowledgeable about Ultium Cells policies and procedures, values, and culture. c5e322f3-2c72-4dc7-b656-b193609691c3.description: The badge earner has successfully completed the OSHA 10-Hour General Industry training at Youngstown State University. The badge earner has awareness of common job-related safety and health hazards. The earner is more knowledgeable about workplace hazards and their rights, and can contribute to a safe and responsible work environment.
c5e322f3-2c72-4dc7-b656-b193609691c3.name: OSHA 10-Hour General Industry

77b56f5e-9e1b-45eb-b097-bd275de9d0a4.description: The badge earner has successfully completed the OSHA 30-Hour General Industry training at Youngstown State University. Earners are knowledgeable about how the provisions of the Occupational Safety and Health Act must be implemented in the workplace to achieve OSHA compliance and quality expectations. Earner knowledge includes hazard recognition, hazard avoidance and abatement, prevention, and safety management. Earners are knowledgeable about employer responsibilities and worker rights.
77b56f5e-9e1b-45eb-b097-bd275de9d0a4.name: OSHA 30-Hour General Industry

db9f6e04-ed71-49be-9bef-868e7a73b353.description: This badge earner has completed the Additive Manufacturing Essentials (CAM-F) training course at Youngstown State University. This training course provides the essential knowledge, skills, and competencies necessary to succeed in the field of AM. Earners of this badge have demonstrated their understanding of the concepts, tasks, and techniques that are applicable to the AM process chain. Earners can understand the AM principles, practices, relevant standards and use of the right terminology.
db9f6e04-ed71-49be-9bef-868e7a73b353.name: Additive Manufacturing Essentials (CAM-F)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Additive Manufacturing Essentials (CAM-F) training course.
Successfully meet or exceed a score of 70% on the SME CAM-F exam.
stuff like this

00522fdc-0952-415a-9dd6-7eff22cdd78f.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Certified Manufacturing Associate (CMfgA) training course at Youngstown State University. The earner will have foundational manufacturing knowledge such as applied mathematics, assembly, maintenance, machining, and inspection. The earner will be able to select and use common safety practices required for most manufacturing environments. The earner will demonstrate their potential for high-demand, entry level manufacturing roles.
00522fdc-0952-415a-9dd6-7eff22cdd78f.name: Certified Manufacturing Associate (CMfgA)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Certified Manufacturing Associate (CMfgA) training course.
Succesfully meet or exceed a score of 70% on the SME CMfgA exam.

skills.name: Proper use of Safety Data Sheets (SDS)
Recongnize Proper Lock Out Tag Out Methods

25c69c7f-ef4f-472d-ab94-a483d73416a4.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Mechatronics Essentials training at Youngstown State University. The badge earner has gained beginner level knowledge in Mechatronics- a system of automated, electro-mechanical machines with PLC or microprocessor control. The earner will be able to demonstrate basic automation, automation safety, PLC functions and use advanced manufacturing concepts.
25c69c7f-ef4f-472d-ab94-a483d73416a4.name: Mechatronics Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Mechatronics Essentials training class.

skills.name: Knowledge of Mechnical and Electrial Systems

fa411c2c-6730-4bd9-9966-c4c486d0aa68.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Automation Technician training through Youngstown State University. This 50-hour lesson series is designed to build on the knowledge, skills, and competencies acquired in the career pathways for maintenance jobs. This badge earner will have knowledge about threaded and unthreaded fasteners, hydraulics, mechanical systems, programmable logic controllers (PLCs), rigging, and robotics.
fa411c2c-6730-4bd9-9966-c4c486d0aa68.name: Automation Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Automation Technician training course to receive badge upon completion.

eae599a0-73f4-49da-b73f-4215b94108b1.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Certified Additive Manufacturing Technician (CAM-T) training course at Youngstown State University and has built on their previous knowledge of Additive Manufacturing and gained Professional Skills such as leadership and communication. Earners are knowledgeable of the seven Additive Manufacturing technologies, methodology of AM and AM processes.
eae599a0-73f4-49da-b73f-4215b94108b1.name: Certified Additive Manufacturing Technician (CAM-T)

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Additive Manufacturing Technician (CAM-T).
Successfully meet or exceed a score of 70% on the SME CAM-T exam.

488f5423-baf7-409d-a9b3-d216660428bd.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Electrical Production training course at Youngstown State University. Earners are knowledgeable about electrical systems, circuits, and shop essentials, such as applied mathematics. In addition, earners will have learned about triangles, Trigonometry, machining, and motor controls. They will understand fundamentals of heat treatment of steel, lubricant and have an overview of soldering.
488f5423-baf7-409d-a9b3-d216660428bd.name: Electrical Production

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Electrical Production training course.

73f5a826-b1a4-4470-8634-e56420968e2c.description: The badge earner has successfully completed the Electrical Technician training course at Youngstown State University. This provides the earner with advanced level knowledge about electrical systems, fasteners, hydraulic and pneumatics, mechanical systems, motor controls and rigging.
73f5a826-b1a4-4470-8634-e56420968e2c.name: Electrical Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements of the Electrical Technician training course.

149c2858-0185-415f-acb1-0743eba59fe4.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Engineering Essentials training course at Youngstown State University. The earner will learn intermediate and advanced level knowledge and abilities in the manufacturing industry. Such as critical thinking regarding inspections, troubleshooting, and manufacturing managerial skills. The earner will have knowledge about Mechanical Systems, Robotics, Applied Mathematics, and Quality Control in the shop.
149c2858-0185-415f-acb1-0743eba59fe4.name: Engineering Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Engineering Essentials training course.

cabdeeae-596a-4fe9-a01e-98a7f4369614.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Engineering Technician training course at Youngstown State University. The earner will learn intermediate and advanced level knowledge and abilities in the manufacturing industry. Such as critical thinking regarding inspections, troubleshooting, and manufacturing managerial skills. The earner will have knowledge about Mechanical Systems, Robotics, Applied Mathematics, and Quality Control in the shop.

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Engineering Technician training course.

75868861-1292-4649-ba4f-19012d5e2a43.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the FANUC HandlingTool Operation & Programming training course at Youngstown State University. In this course, the earner will learn tasks that an operator, technician, engineer or programmer needs to set up and program a FANUC Robotics HandlingTool Software Package.

7e71fdc9-3931-48cf-8b1e-74822a727ac2.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Machine Operator training course at Youngstown State University. The earner will have intermediate to advanced knowledge regarding Machine Operations. They will understand machining/manual machining, how to operate machines, troubleshooting faults, how to follow safety procedures in the shop, and maintenance performance.
7e71fdc9-3931-48cf-8b1e-74822a727ac2.name: Machine Operator

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Machine Operator Training Course.

b8977774-65d6-494e-9b97-975b1456c296.description: The badge earner has successfully completed the Machining Essentials training course at Youngstown State University. The earner will have basic and intermediate knowledge about machining and will have developed the skills necessary to understand the properties, safe operation, and maintenance of industrial machines.
b8977774-65d6-494e-9b97-975b1456c296.name: Machining Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Machining Essentials training course.

8d04cfad-62df-4d19-9c7a-7668911263e8.description: This badge earner has successfully completed the Master 3D Printer Operator training course at Youngstown State University. The earner will be able to demonstrate proficiency in digital design, recognize unique properties of 3D printing, use of CAD designs, and identify and solve problems within 3D printers.
8d04cfad-62df-4d19-9c7a-7668911263e8.name: Master 3D Printer Operator

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Master 3D Printer Operator training course.
Successfully meet or exceed the requirements for the 3D printing capstone project.

6c98bb62-2179-47fa-a370-407a57af32ed.description: The earner of this badge has successfully completed the Mechatronics Technician training course at Youngstown State University. Earners of this badge have prepared to become certified as mechatronics technicians, which combines knowledge of mechanical technology and electric circuits. They can install, troubleshoot, repair, and upgrade electronic and computer-controlled mechanical systems.
6c98bb62-2179-47fa-a370-407a57af32ed.name: Mechatronics Technician

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements for the Mechatronics Technician training course.

9b3e40fa-f276-4709-b5df-461ba59e98c0.description: This badge earner has completed the Quality Technician Essentials training course at Youngstown State University. The earner will be prepared to take on the role of a paraprofessional, who will be under the direction of quality engineers or supervisors. They will be able to analyze and solve quality problems, prepare inspection plans/instructions, select sampling plan applications, prepare procedures, train inspectors, perform audits, and apply fundamental statistical methods for process control
9b3e40fa-f276-4709-b5df-461ba59e98c0.name: Quality Technician Essentials

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully meet or exceed the completion requirements of the Quality Technician Essentials training course.

cb130abd-77a2-4993-b70e-b2439be35af9.description: The objective of this challenge is to increase awareness and understanding around the roles tech and innovation play in Ohio’s economy and to inspire our next generation of tech leaders. Ohio Tech Day shows high school students that you don’t have to leave home in order to find great career opportunities in tech. Participants in the YSU Ohio Tech Day Challenge, will have the opportunity to gain foundational knowledge in professional skills, programming, technology, and cybersecurity.
cb130abd-77a2-4993-b70e-b2439be35af9.name: YSU Ohio Tech Day Challenge 2021

badge_template_activities.title: This badge is only available to registered users who are working with the YSU Division of Workforce Education and Innovation on the YSU Ohio Tech Day Challenge 2021 through the YSU Skills Accelerator.
